messages.title: Labour is letting us down
messages.content: Labour is letting us down. Labour is letting down the NHS in the NHS’s darkest hour. Labour's scrapping ...

messages.title: WHO WILL REALLY FIGHT FOR OUR NHS?
messages.content: Labour is letting down the NHS. Labour's scrapping for power. They’re too busy fighting each other to fight for our NHS.

messages.title: ONLY THE LIB DEMS WILL FIGHT THE TORIES ON NHS AND SCHOOL CUTS
messages.content: Lib Dems pledge to spend twice as much on education as Labour. The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight Tory cuts on NHS and school cuts, commit to a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care funded by a penny on Income Tax
Pledge to spend twice as much on education as Labour

mentions.tacticalSituation: With Labour divided and Conservatives in power, Lib Dems present themselves as the party to stand up to Tories.

issues.education: Lib Dems pledge to spend twice as much on education as Labour.
issues.health: Lib Dems have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

housing.content: Lib Dems have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

quotes.text: There is no realistic chance of us winning.
Labour is fatally divided inside Parliament and outside it.
We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our new leader.
quotes.source: Labour MP Jack Dromey—The Mirror, 10 May 2017

quotes.text: Widowed parents are being hit again by Tory cuts to bereavement benefits.
NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study.
Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.

images.caption: Vote for the party that stands up to Theresa May's cuts. VOTE LIB DEM.
